|brand = D-Link |model = DSR-1000 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = N |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/24/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DSR-1000N_rev_A1 |wlclass = AN600 |series = DSR |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2SR1000NA1 |icid = 4216A-SR1000NA1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5010; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29GL256EHT2I-90G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4T1G164QF-BCE7; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM5081; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53115; |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 9C:D6:43
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;Development build; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0, |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.4 |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, internal,, RJ-45 |jtag = yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, J2
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, power switch, heat sink, metal case |addchip = USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;UPD720114;;1;,,, PLL-based Clock Generator;IDT;ICS30S07AIL;;1;,,, I2C Serial Real Time Clock;Maxim Integrated;DS1337;;1;,,, 2 Channel RS232 Interface;Analog Devices;ADM3202;;1;,,, 2-Bit, 2-Port, Low Voltage Translator Bus Switch;Pericom;PI3VT3306;;1;,,, 30V Dual P-Channel MOSFET;unknown;4803;;6;,,, 3-State Octal Buffer/Line Driver;NXP;LVC244A;;1;,,, Quad 2-input AND gate;NXP;74LVC08AD;;2;,,, Octal D-type transparent latch;NXP;LVC373A;;1;,,, Quad 2-Input AND Gate;NXP;74HCT08D;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.10.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/25/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B004HZG2MO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Cameo WLN-1313 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :802.11a/b/g/n 2.4/5GHz (Selectable Dual Band) :3x Detachable 2dBi Omni-Directional Antennas
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5010 @500MHz :SoC: Single-core [[MIPS64]] *Storage: 32MB Flash *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Wi-Fi: [[Atheros]] AR9160 802.11abgn *Network: 6x GbE (WAN/LAN) ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 100/240V via C13
==Links of Interest== [https://eu.dlink.com/uk/en/-/media/business_products/dsr/dsr-1000n/manual/dsr_1000n_manual_2_02_en.pdf Manual] *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/ru/toh/d-link/dsr-1000n ''D-Link DSR-1000N'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :CPU: [[Cavium]] CN5010-500BG564-SCP-G
